name: Skeletonx
short_description:
SkeletonX provides a means that goes beyond being a simple template engine, for creating code generation code (so, it does some of the work for helping people make code generators). This version(s) is(are) still very much in the work in progress stage. The exact dynamics and structure of the project has yet to be finalised and it is very rough around the edges. It is mainly been made available to give possibly interested people an awareness of the project. It is a project with a very constrained target audience...

It is intended to one day be flexible enough to allow easy code generation in multiple languages but currently it only supports Java output for code to produce Java code.
summary: A code generator code generator - to make code generation code.
